item.title: Delhi weather: Several flights, trains delayed as dense fog grips national capital; mercury dips to 10°C - The Times of India
item.description:
Delhi weather: Several flights, trains delayed as dense fog grips national capital; mercury dips to 10°C

Date: Published on January 5, 2025

Source: Times of India

Severe fog conditions in Delhi have led to significant delays in flights and trains, with temperatures dropping to as low as 10°C. The weather situation has caused widespread disruptions in transportation.

  • Dense fog has resulted in multiple flight cancellations and delays.
  • Train services have been severely affected, with many trains running late.
  • Weather forecasts predict continued fog conditions for the next few days.
“The visibility is very low, affecting both air and rail transport.”

Officials are advising travelers to check the status of their journeys before heading out and to remain patient as the weather conditions persist.

item.title: 5 most beautiful images of nebula captured by NASA Hubble Space Telescope - India.com
item.description:
5 Most Beautiful Images of Nebula Captured by NASA Hubble Space Telescope

Date: January 5, 2025 Source: India.com

This article showcases the five most beautiful nebula images captured by NASA's Hubble Space Telescope, highlighting their unique characteristics and significance to astronomy.

  • The Ghost Nebula in the constellation of Cassiopeia exhibits flowing veils of gas and dust.
  • The Horsehead Nebula is shown in infrared light to commemorate the Hubble's launch anniversary.
  • The Eagle Nebula, also known as Messier 16, has provided numerous iconic images.
  • The Orion Nebula is noted for having the sharpest view obtained by Hubble.
  • The image of NGC 6530 depicts a wall of smoke blended with bright stars.
“Thanks for reading!”

This article celebrates the beauty and significance of nebula imagery captured by Hubble, inspiring further exploration and appreciation of the universe.

item.title: "Have To Be Fair": Gautam Gambhir's Blunt Take On Future Of Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma - NDTV Sports
item.description:
"Have To Be Fair": Gautam Gambhir's Blunt Take On Future Of Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma

Publication Date: January 5, 2025 • Source: NDTV

In a recent press conference, India head coach Gautam Gambhir addressed questions regarding the future of senior players Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma following the team's defeat in Sydney.

  • Gambhir refused to comment definitively on the future of Kohli and Sharma, citing their 'hunger' as a deciding factor.
  • He emphasized the need to be fair to all players in the team, regardless of experience.
  • Both players have struggled with form recently, raising questions about their selection for upcoming matches.
  • Rohit Sharma appeared in an interview expressing his commitment to continue playing despite retirement rumors.
  • The selectors face challenges in deciding the future of the veteran players as India prepares for a series in England.
"I can't comment on the future of any Players, it is up to them. They have the hunger and commitment - hopefully they can do everything they can to take Indian cricket forward." - Gautam Gambhir

The upcoming selections for India's Test squad will significantly impact the team's future dynamics, especially concerning seasoned players like Kohli and Sharma.

item.title: HMPV outbreak in China: Telangana health department issues dos & don’ts - The Times of India
item.description:
HMPV Outbreak in China: Telangana Health Department Issues Guidelines

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Telangana Health Department

The Telangana health department has issued dos and don’ts in response to the HMPV outbreak in China, highlighting the importance of preventive measures.

  • The health department is raising awareness about Human Metapneumovirus (HMPV), which is affecting individuals in China.
  • Guidelines include recommendations on hygiene practices and precautions to prevent infection.
  • Officials are monitoring the situation closely and providing regular updates to the public.
“Prevention is crucial as we face this outbreak; we urge everyone to follow the guidelines issued,” said a health official.

The outbreak of HMPV serves as a reminder of the need for vigilance regarding respiratory illnesses.

item.title: India vs Australia Highlights, 5th Test Day 3: AUS claim BGT after a decade with 6-wicket win, IND out of WTC Final race - Hindustan Times
item.description:
India vs Australia Highlights, 5th Test Day 3: AUS claim BGT after a decade with 6-wicket win, IND out of WTC Final race

Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a thrilling match, Australia claimed the Border-Gavaskar Trophy after defeating India by 6 wickets, clinching the series 3-1. This win marks a significant moment for Australia, who had not won the trophy in a decade.

  • Travis Head (34*) and Beau Webster (39*) led Australia to victory.
  • India's Jasprit Bumrah missed the match due to injury, impacting India's bowling lineup.
  • Australia scored 162 runs to win after India was bowled out for 157 in their second innings.
  • Scott Boland achieved a remarkable 10-wicket haul across both innings.
  • India is now out of contention for the World Test Championship Final.
“Unreal. Few of us didn't have. Lived up to all the hype...Immensely proud.” - Pat Cummins

Overall, Australia's strong performance throughout the series allowed them to regain the trophy, while India faced challenges due to injuries and missed opportunities.

item.title: 4 Maoists Gunned Down, 1 Security Personnel Dies In Chhattisgarh Encounter - NDTV
item.description:
Four Maoists Killed in Chhattisgarh Encounter, One Security Personnel Dies

Publication Date: Today | Source: NDTV

An encounter between Maoists and security forces in Chhattisgarh's Bastar region resulted in the deaths of four Maoists and one security personnel. The clash occurred during an anti-Maoist operation in the forests of Narayanpur and Dantewada districts.

  • Four Maoists were killed during a face-off with security personnel.
  • One head constable from the District Reserve Guard (DRG) named Sannu Karam lost his life.
  • Security forces were conducting an anti-Maoist operation when the encounter took place.
  • After the exchange of fire, bodies of the Maoists and their weapons were recovered.
  • In 2024, over 200 Maoists have been killed, with a focus on eradicating this insurgency by March 2026.
  • 18 security personnel have reportedly died in anti-Maoist operations this year, alongside 65 civilians due to Maoist violence.
“Amit Shah vowing to eradicate them by March 2026.”

The ongoing operations highlight the persistent conflict between security forces and Maoist insurgents in the region, with the government emphasizing its commitment to restoring peace.

item.title: Hamas releases new video of Israeli hostage Liri Albag, held for over 450 days - The Times of India
item.description:
Hamas releases new video of Israeli hostage Liri Albag, held for over 450 days

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

In a recent development, Hamas has released a video of Liri Albag, an Israeli hostage who has been held for over 450 days.

  • The video emphasizes the ongoing plight of hostages.
  • Liri Albag's captivity has raised concerns globally.
  • This move by Hamas is viewed amidst the backdrop of ongoing conflict.
“This is a reminder of the human cost of conflict.”

The release of the video showcases the complex humanitarian issues intertwined with the political situation.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Trailer: Action and emotion in perfect harmony - 123telugu
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Trailer: Action and Emotion in Perfect Harmony

Published on: Jan 5, 2025 8:54 am IST

Daaku Maharaaj, directed by Bobby Kolli and starring Nandamuri Balakrishna, is gearing up for a grand Sankranthi release. This action-packed emotional drama has already captured attention with its high-octane trailer, unveiled during a pre-release event held in Dallas, USA.

  • The trailer builds suspense by keeping the storyline shrouded in mystery.
  • Balakrishna delivers a restrained yet commanding performance with minimal but impactful dialogues.
  • The film's emotional depth, particularly the child sentiment, is a standout element.
  • Thaman’s background score enhances the trailer’s impact amidst stunning visuals.
  • The film stars Shraddha Srinath and Pragya Jaiswal in substantial roles, alongside Balakrishna.
  • Bobby Deol plays a ruthless animal smuggler, adding an edge to the narrative.
  • Daaku Maharaaj is set to release on January 12, 2025.

With its intriguing trailer and star-studded cast, the film has already raised expectations to new heights. Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting project.

item.title: Arjun Kapoor makes a rare mention of late stepmother Sridevi, calls her ‘ma’am’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Arjun Kapoor Reflects on Late Stepmother Sridevi in Rare Mention

Date: Jan 05, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, Bollywood actor Arjun Kapoor made a rare mention of his late stepmother, legendary actress Sridevi, discussing her in the context of a film set where they both shared a significant connection.

  • Arjun referenced Sridevi while discussing the film 'Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja'.
  • The film was produced by his father Boney Kapoor and featured Sridevi alongside Anil Kapoor.
  • Sridevi was dating Boney Kapoor during the film's production while he was still married to Arjun's mother, Mona Kapoor.
  • Arjun expressed a protective feeling towards his stepsisters after Sridevi's tragic passing in 2018.
  • His upcoming film 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi' is set for release on February 21.
“My entire life with my father was being on Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja set... Even by today’s standards, it is one of the biggest films we ever made.” - Arjun Kapoor

This mention highlights Arjun's deep connection to his family and the impact of Sridevi's presence in his life, despite her early passing.

item.title: Joe Biden honours Hillary Clinton, George Soros, Lionel Messi with Presidential Medal of Freedom - The Hindu
item.description:
Joe Biden honours Hillary Clinton, George Soros, Lionel Messi with Presidential Medal of Freedom

Published: January 05, 2025 Source: The Hindu

On January 4, 2025, President Joe Biden presented the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the nation’s highest civilian honor, to several notable figures including Hillary Clinton and George Soros. The ceremony, held in the East Room of the White House, recognized individuals who have significantly impacted American culture and ideals.

  • President Biden awarded the Medal to 16 individuals, including Hillary Clinton, George Soros, and others.
  • Due to a scheduling conflict, Lionel Messi was not present to receive his award.
  • Biden emphasized the extraordinary contributions of the recipients in shaping American culture and humanitarian efforts.
  • Hillary Clinton received a standing ovation for her extensive contributions to society as a lawyer, First Lady, Senator, and Secretary of State.
  • Posthumous awards were given to notable figures like Fannie Lou Hamer and Robert F. Kennedy.
  • The awarding process faced criticism from Republican leaders who opposed Soros receiving the honor.
“The Presidential Medal of Freedom is awarded to George Soros. Born into a Jewish family in Hungary, George Soros escaped Nazi occupation to build a life of freedom...”

Overall, the event highlighted the importance of recognizing individuals committed to the ideals of freedom and democracy in America, while also sparking significant political controversy regarding some recipients.

item.title: Who was Jeff Baena? Aubrey Plaza's husband found dead at LA home - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jeff Baena, Filmmaker and Husband of Aubrey Plaza, Found Dead at 47

Date: Jan 05, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Filmmaker Jeff Baena, known for his works including Life After Beth and Joshy, was found dead in a Los Angeles residence at the age of 47. The cause of death is currently under investigation.

  • Baena directed notable films such as Life After Beth, Joshy, and The Little Hours.
  • He was married to actress Aubrey Plaza, who starred in many of his films.
  • Baena expressed his passion for cinema was influenced by films like A Clockwork Orange and 8 1/2.
  • His family includes his wife Aubrey, mother Barbara, father Scott, and stepfamily.
“The opportunities to create together, to do something creative where we’re both fulfilled, it’s like how rare is that?” - Jeff Baena

Baena's death has raised questions about mental health and the pressures faced by those in the entertainment industry. His contributions to cinema will be remembered.

item.title: India vs Australia LIVE Cricket Score, 5th Test Day 3: Mohammed Siraj picks Usman Khawaja, AUS 125/4 vs IND in Sydney - The Indian Express
item.description:
India vs Australia LIVE Cricket Score, 5th Test Day 3: Mohammed Siraj picks Usman Khawaja, AUS 158/4 vs IND in Sydney

Publication Date: January 4, 2025 Source: Indian Express

Australia is chasing a target of 162 runs with 71/3 at lunch on Day 3. Bowling standout Prasidh Krishna has claimed all three wickets for India, while Scott Boland's six wickets helped put India at 157 in their third innings.

  • Australia needs 162 runs to win the series 3-1.
  • Prasidh Krishna picked up all three wickets, showcasing a strong performance.
  • Scott Boland's six wickets reduced India to 157 runs in the third innings.
  • Rishabh Pant contributed a critical 33-ball 61 to lead India's efforts.
  • Jasprit Bumrah's fitness remains a concern for the Indian team.
"Despite a valiant effort, India is seeking at least a 60-80 run lead, particularly in Bumrah's absence."

The match is tight, with critical performances needed from Indian bowlers as Australia looks to secure the win.

item.description:
India vs Australia LIVE Score, 5th Test, Day 3: Another DRS Blunder By India, Jasprit Bumrah Gears Up

Date & Source: Not provided

In the ongoing 5th Test match between India and Australia, the game has seen exciting moments as well as controversies, including a significant DRS (Decision Review System) blunder involving Indian players. Jasprit Bumrah is set to take the field as India seeks to counter Australia's performance.

  • 5th Test match between India and Australia.
  • Highlights include controversies surrounding the DRS system.
  • Jasprit Bumrah is preparing to play a crucial role for India.
"DRS decisions have always been a topic of heated discussions during matches."

The match is intensifying as both teams vie for a pivotal win, making this day of cricket crucial for upcoming series outcomes.

item.title: Indo Farm Equipment IPO: Here's what GMP signals ahead of listing | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Indo Farm Equipment IPO GMP and Subscription Update Ahead of Listing

Publication Date: January 5, 2023 | Source: Live Mint

The Indo Farm Equipment IPO has shown overwhelming investor interest, being oversubscribed by 229.68 times overall. The listing is set for January 7, 2023, with a grey market premium indicating a potential listing price significantly higher than the IPO price.

Key Points:

  • IPO closed on January 2, 2023, with 1,94,53,89,519 shares bid for against 84,70,000 shares available.
  • Oversubscription rates: QIBs 242.40 times, NIIs 503.83 times, and retail investors 104.92 times.
  • Grey market price indicates a listing forecast at ₹311, a 44.65% rise from the IPO price of ₹215.
  • Fresh issue includes 86 lakh shares, with an OFS of 35 lakh shares.
  • Proceeds will be used for manufacturing capacity expansion, debt repayment, and investment in Barota Finance.
  • The IPO is valued at ₹260 crore, propelling market capitalization over ₹1,000 crore.
The grey market premium has seen a decrease from ₹99 on the allotment day to ₹96.

The strong demand for the Indo Farm Equipment IPO reflects robust investor confidence, with expectations of healthy performance upon its market debut.

item.title: Mask Wearing Strict Screening Compulsory In Kerala Telangana As HMPV Virus Spreads Rapidly In China - TheHealthSite
item.description:
Strict Mask Wearing and Screening Implemented in Kerala and Telangana Due to Rapid Spread of HMPV Virus in China

Publication Date: Not specified Source: TheHealthSite

The Kerala and Telangana governments have issued guidelines to prevent the spread of HMPV virus, which causes serious respiratory illnesses, following reports of a rapid outbreak in China.

  • A new virus, HMPV, is spreading in China, causing pneumonia-like symptoms.
  • The virus predominantly affects children under 14 and the elderly.
  • Kerala Health Minister has advised mask-wearing and caution but reassured there is no immediate panic.
  • Precautionary measures include isolation, hydration, and avoiding crowds.
  • Reports suggest the increase in hospital cases in China is due to HMPV, COVID-19 variants, and Influenza A.
"Children should not be sent to school during illness. Those with respiratory symptoms should definitely wear weak masks." - Kerala Health Minister Veena George

This response from the governments reflects proactive measures in the face of potential public health concerns, urging citizens to remain vigilant and informed.

item.title: Can chronic illnesses be prevented in 2025? Five doctors from across the country give you 25 pro tips - The Indian Express
item.description:
Five Doctors Reveal 25 Pro Tips to Prevent Chronic Illnesses by 2025

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: Indian Express

This article provides insights from five medical professionals offering practical tips for preventing chronic illnesses as we approach 2025. Emphasizing routines, mental health, and regular check-ups, the tips aim to optimize health and well-being.

  • Dr. Vijay Natarajan suggests creating 'me' time for mental health.
  • Set timers to encourage regular movement.
  • Check Vitamin D levels regularly to maintain overall health.
  • Focus on mental health as part of a holistic approach.
  • Ensure cardiac fitness with proper testing before starting fitness plans.
“Neglecting mental health can worsen health conditions.” - Dr. Vijay Natarajan

Overall, these tips highlight the importance of incorporating healthy habits into daily life, stressing that personal time and self-care are critical components in chronic illness prevention.

item.title: Virat Kohli imitates sandpaper scandal after Steve Smith's dismissal - Watch - The Times of India
item.description:
Virat Kohli Imitates Sandpaper Scandal After Steve Smith's Dismissal

Date: Not provided
Source: Times of India

Virat Kohli engaged with the crowd during a recent Test match against Australia, humorously imitating the infamous sandpaper scandal following Steve Smith's dismissal, showcasing his connection with fans and his vibrant on-field persona.

  • Kohli's dynamic engagement with the crowd is part of his appeal.
  • He often teases the crowd and interacts playfully during matches.
  • Prasidh Krishna provided a strong bowling performance against Australia.
  • Smith's dismissal came as he was on the brink of 10,000 Test runs.
  • Kohli's imitation referenced the sandpaper scandal from 2018, which involved ball tampering.
“The leadership group had devised the plan to tamper with the ball,” - Steve Smith

The incident highlights Kohli's spirited nature and the ongoing engagement between players and fans during high-stakes matches.

item.title: Yuzvendra Chahal's Cryptic Post Amid Divorce Rumours With Wife Dhanashree Verma - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Yuzvendra Chahal's Cryptic Post Amid Divorce Rumours With Wife Dhanashree Verma

Publication Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: NDTV

There seems to be trouble in Yuzvendra Chahal's paradise, with rumours of his split with his wife Dhanashree Verma intensifying after he removed all pictures with her from social media.

  • Chahal's cryptic Instagram story suggests a reflection on personal struggles without confirming the divorce.
  • Rumours intensified as both unfollowed each other on social media platforms.
  • Reports suggest 'divorce is inevitable' due to irrevocable differences.
  • The couple was engaged on August 8, 2020, and married on December 22, 2020.
  • They were considered one of the most popular couples on social media.
“Hard work spotlights the character of people. You know your journey. You know your pain.” — Yuzvendra Chahal via Instagram

This unfolding situation has captured public attention, with fans speculating about the couple's future.

item.title: Virat Kohli brutally taunts Australian crowd with cold-blooded sandpaper gesture after Steve Smith's dismissal - Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Virat Kohli Taunts Australian Crowd with Sandpaper Gesture after Steve Smith's Dismissal

Date: Jan 05, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

In a charged cricket match in Sydney, Virat Kohli continued his contentious relationship with the Australian crowd by referencing the sandpaper scandal with a bold gesture, leading to an electrifying atmosphere.

  • Kohli responded to audience jeers with a gesture of emptying his pockets.
  • This was a nod to the sandpapergate scandal involving Steve Smith and Cameron Bancroft.
  • The incident occurred right after Smith's dismissal during the innings.
  • Kohli's controversial actions have escalated the tensions between him and Australian fans.
  • Jasprit Bumrah was sidelined due to injury, putting additional pressure on Kohli as captain.
Kohli urged the crowd to boo louder, showing his defiance against their hostility.

Kohli's taunt not only reignites memories of past scandals but signals an ongoing rivalry that keeps cricket fans engaged and the tension palpable.

item.title: Ancient warship wreck found by Lakshadweep divers near Kalpeni Island: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ancient Warship Wreck Discovered Near Lakshadweep Island

Date: Jan 05, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

A group of divers discovered what appears to be the wreck of a European warship from the 17th or 18th century while exploring marine life near Kalpeni Island in the Lakshadweep archipelago.

  • The wreck is believed to belong to one of three European nations: Portuguese, Dutch, or British.
  • This is the first such discovery in the region.
  • The wreckage provides a historical link to maritime conflicts over trade routes in the 17th and 18th centuries.
  • The presence of a cannon suggests it was a warship, possibly made of iron and wood.
“When we spotted the wreck... we realized it could be an important find,” said Satyajeet Mane, a marine explorer.

This remarkable discovery highlights the need for further underwater archaeological studies to uncover more about the ship and protect the site.

item.title: Game Changer team surprises fans with three new songs - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer Team Surprises Fans with Three New Songs

Published on: Jan 5, 2025 7:00 am IST

The pre-release event of Game Changer has generated significant excitement with three unexpected new songs released by the team. The film stars Ram Charan and is set for a theatrical release soon.

  • The team released seven songs in total, including three surprise tracks.
  • Ram Charan and Anjali's song “Arugu Meeda” has generated particular fan interest.
  • The film will release on January 10, 2025.
  • Full promotional activities are planned before the release.
"The pre-release event was a sensational success, further amplifying expectations."

This surprise release has heightened anticipation for the film, which is expected to make a strong impact during the Sankranthi season.

item.title: Press Council seeks report from Chhattisgarh govt on Bastar journalist Mukesh Chandrakar’s murder - The Hindu
item.description:
Press Council seeks report from Chhattisgarh govt on Bastar journalist Mukesh Chandrakar’s murder

Published on: January 05, 2025 06:44 am IST, Source: The Hindu

The Press Council of India has expressed concern over the suspected murder of journalist Mukesh Chandrakar and has called for a report from the Chhattisgarh state government.

Mukesh Chandrakar, a freelance journalist in Bastar, was reported missing on January 1, with his body found later in a septic tank. Actions have led to the arrest of three individuals connected to the case, and a Special Investigation Team has been set up to investigate.

  • The PCI expressed concern and sought details from the state government.
  • Chandrakar's body was found in a septic tank owned by a suspect.
  • Three arrests have been made, including family members of the victim.
  • An argument over construction work is believed to be the motive behind the murder.
  • Protests were held by journalists demanding justice.
“Why is corruption of Suresh Chandrakar exposed by Mukesh not being discussed?” - Sushil Anand Shukla, Congress communication wing chief.

In conclusion, the incident highlights the dangers faced by journalists in the region and raises concerns about the safety and integrity of the media in Chhattisgarh.

item.title: Lionel Messi breaks silence on ‘Biden snub’ for skipping Presidential Medal of Freedom ceremony - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Lionel Messi Explains Absence from Presidential Medal of Freedom Ceremony

Publication Date: N/A Source: Hindustan Times

Lionel Messi addressed his absence from the prestigious Presidential Medal of Freedom ceremony, attributing it to scheduling conflicts. He expressed deep honor for receiving the award from President Joe Biden.

  • Messi was one of 19 honorees recognized during the ceremony.
  • The event featured notable figures like Hillary Clinton and Magic Johnson.
  • His public relations team stated that prior commitments prevented his attendance.
  • Messi sent a letter expressing gratitude and hopes to meet President Biden in the future.
  • Disappointment from fans over Messi's absence was noted, with some deeming it disrespectful.
“For the final time as president I have the honor bestowing the Medal of Freedom, our nation’s highest civilian honor, on a group of extraordinary, truly extraordinary people.” - President Joe Biden

In conclusion, Lionel Messi's notable absence from this significant ceremony highlights the balance between professional commitments and personal schedules, while eliciting strong public reactions.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 31: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer picks pace on its fifth - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 31: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer picks pace on its fifth Saturday with Rs.5.5 crore business, while Varun Dhawan’s ‘Baby John’ struggles to mint even Rs.1 crore

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The mass entertainer ‘Pushpa 2’ has shown impressive performance at the box office, completing its fifth Saturday with a collection of Rs. 5.5 crore. The film, featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, has seen a significant increase in earnings compared to previous days, while facing tough competition from Varun Dhawan’s ‘Baby John’.

  • On Day 31, the film's collection rose to Rs. 5.5 crore, up over 40% from the previous day's Rs. 3.75 crore.
  • The total collection in India has now reached ₹ 1199 crore.
  • Box office breakdown includes Rs. 4.35 crore from Hindi, Rs. 1 crore from Telugu, Rs. 0.14 crore from Tamil, and Rs. 0.01 crore from Kannada.
  • ‘Baby John’, released on Christmas, failed to reach even Rs. 1 crore on the same day.
‘Pushpa 2’ continues to shine despite its competition from the highly awaited ‘Baby John’ which has failed the box office test.

In conclusion, 'Pushpa 2' is expected to maintain its stronghold at the box office, especially with the anticipated impressive performance on Sunday.
